original_text: So the Lord God caused the man to sleep. While the man was sleeping, God took a rib from the man. Then he closed up the place in his body and he covered it again.
korean_text: 여호와 하나님이 아담을 깊이 잠들게 하시니 잠들매 그가 그 갈빗대 하나를 취하고 살로 대신 채우시고

sentences.original_text: So the Lord God caused the man to sleep.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 주 하나님은 사람이 잠들게 하셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: God took a rib from the man.
Then he closed up the place in his body
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 몸의 그 부위를 닫았고
